tool_description: The best BINANCE NFT parser. Fast support, fast query response speed. Need some quick help? https://t.me/array05
title: BINANCE NFT

api_list.name: Top collections

optional_parameters.name: day
optional_parameters.description:
0 - For all the time
1 - For 1 day
7 - For week
30 - For month

api_list.name: Market mystery recommend
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-nft.p.rapidapi.com/market-mystery-recommend/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-nft.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
